item.title: 中国要求部分银行限制银行间融资成本——消息人士
item.description:
China's central bank asked some lenders to cap interest rates on an interbank debt instrument this month, people with knowledge of the matter said on Friday, referring to the rising short-term yields on bank debt and strains in funding markets.翻译:知情人士周五表示，中国央行本月要求一些银行限制银行间债务工具的利率，指的是银行债务短期收益率上升和融资市场紧张。

Some large-sized commercial lenders were told not to sell negotiable certificates of deposit (NCDs) at very high rates, four sources said. NCDs are a popular short-term debt instrument issued between banks for their financing needs.翻译:四位消息人士称，一些大型商业贷款机构被告知不要以极高的利率出售可转让存单（NCD）。 NCD 是银行之间为满足融资需求而发行的一种流行的短期债务工具。

The latest central bank guidance underscores authorities' intent to keep borrowing costs low in the slowing economy, even as the central and local governments issue more debt to infuse into infrastructure and consumer sectors.翻译:央行最新指引强调，尽管中央和地方政府发行更多债务注入基础设施和消费领域，但当局仍打算在经济放缓的情况下保持较低的借贷成本。

NCD issuance rates and the secondary market rate have risen steadily since August and are now near six-month highs, traders said.翻译:交易员表示，NCD 发行利率和二级市场利率自 8 月份以来稳步上升，目前接近六个月高位。

Banks were also told to keep interest rates relatively stable ahead of the central bank's medium-term policy loan operations.翻译:在央行中期政策性贷款操作之前，银行还被告知要保持利率相对稳定。

China's central bank on Wednesday ramped up cash injections by pumping 1.45 trillion yuan ($200.14 billion) worth of one-year medium-term lending facility (MLF) loans to some financial institutions.翻译:中国央行周三加大了现金注入力度，向一些金融机构发放了价值1.45万亿元人民币（合2001.4亿美元）的一年期中期借贷便利（ MLF ）贷款。

The size of the liquidity injection exceeded market expectations and resulted a net 600 billion yuan of net cash injections into the banking system, the biggest monthly increase since December 2016.翻译:流动性注入规模超出市场预期，导致银行体系净现金净注入6000亿元，创2016年12月以来最大单月增幅。

Financial institutions have issued a total of more than 2 trillion yuan worth of NCDs so far this month, including more than 750 billion yuan this week, according to Reuters calculations based on official data.翻译:据路透根据官方数据计算，本月迄今为止，金融机构已发行非传染性疾病总额超过2万亿元人民币，其中本周超过7500亿元人民币。

Banks have been very actively issuing NCDs to raise funds to make up for a liquidity gap in recent months as heavy debt supply, including China's newly approved 1 trillion yuan worth of sovereign bond issuance, triggered needs for more long-term funds.翻译:近几个月来，由于包括中国新批准的1万亿元主权债券发行在内的大量债务供应引发了对更多长期资金的需求，银行一直非常积极地发行同业存单来筹集资金以弥补流动性缺口。

All the sources spoke on the condition of anonymity as they were not authorised to talk to the media about the matter.翻译:所有消息人士均不愿透露姓名，因为他们无权与媒体谈论此事。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC) did not immediately respond to Reuters request for comments.翻译:中国人民银行（PBOC）没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

At the same time, the PBOC has been managing cash levels to contain yield differences with the United States and other major economies, which have sharply tightened policy, in order to support the yuan currency , which has fallen nearly 5% against the dollar so far this year.翻译:与此同时，中国人民银行一直在管理现金水平，以遏制与美国和其他主要经济体的收益率差异，这些经济体已大幅收紧政策，以支撑迄今为止兑美元汇率已下跌近5%的人民币。今年。

Earlier this month, China's financial regulators investigated a month-end liquidity crunch that saw short-term money rates surge to as much as 50% on Oct. 31, and asked some institutions to explain why they borrowed at extremely high rates, Reuters reported.翻译:据路透社报道，本月早些时候，中国金融监管机构对月末流动性紧缩事件进行了调查，该紧缩事件导致短期货币利率在 10 月 31 日飙升至 50%，并要求一些机构解释为何以极高的利率借款。

The interest rate on one-year AAA-rated NCDs has been persistently trading higher than the one-year MLF rate the central bank charges financial institutions since October.翻译:自10月份以来，一年期AAA级非传染性疾病利率一直高于央行向金融机构收取的一年期MLF利率。

It last traded at a near six-month high of 2.5711% on Friday, about 7 basis points higher than the one-year MLF rate of 2.5%.翻译:周五，其最后交易价格为近六个月高点2.5711%，比一年期MLF利率2.5%高出约7个基点。

($1 = 7.2448 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2448 人民币）

Reporting by Shanghai and Beijing Newsroom Editing by Vidya Ranganathan and Kim Coghill翻译:上海和北京新闻室报道 Vidya Ranganathan 和 Kim Coghill 编辑

item.title: 中国就出口管制、制裁和关税向美国提出担忧
item.description:
China's commerce minister expressed concern over U.S. curbs on semiconductor exports to China, as well as sanctions on Chinese firms and tariffs on Chinese imports, when he met U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo on Thursday, his ministry said Friday.翻译:中国商务部周五表示，中国商务部部长周四会见美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多时，表达了对美国限制对华半导体出口、对中国企业实施制裁以及对中国进口产品征收关税的担忧。

Wang Wentao told Raimondo in San Francisco: "it is very important the two sides discuss the boundary between national security concerns and trade and economic cooperation," a statement read.翻译:王文涛在旧金山告诉雷蒙多：“双方讨论国家安全关切与贸易和经济合作之间的界限非常重要，”一份声明中写道。

The world's two biggest economies used to be each other's largest trading partners, and while both governments publicly oppose decoupling, China is now trading more with Southeast Asia and the U.S. with neighbouring Canada and Mexico.翻译:世界上最大的两个经济体曾经是彼此最大的贸易伙伴，尽管两国政府都公开反对脱钩，但中国现在与东南亚以及美国与邻国加拿大和墨西哥的贸易增加。

"Wang Wentao expressed concern about the final rules of the U.S. semiconductor export controls against China, sanctions against Chinese companies, two-way investment restrictions, and Section 301 tariffs," according to China's commerce ministry.翻译:中国商务部表示，“王文涛对美国对华半导体出口管制、对中国企业制裁、双向投资限制、301关税等最终规则表示担忧”。

U.S. President Joe Biden has retained additional tariffs placed on a plethora of Chinese exports under the previous Trump administration and added new restrictions prohibiting the export of advanced semiconductors and the equipment to make them, citing security concerns.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登以安全考虑为由，保留了上届特朗普政府对大量中国出口产品征收的额外关税，并增加了禁止出口先进半导体及其制造设备的新限制。

Two-way trade hit a record $690 billion last year, as U.S. demand for Chinese consumer goods rose and Beijing's demand for U.S. farm products and energy grew.翻译:去年，随着美国对中国消费品的需求增加以及北京对美国农产品和能源的需求增加，两国双向贸易额达到创纪录的6900亿美元。

This year is off to a significantly slower pace, however, with two-way trade flows through September down $104 billion, or 19%, from the first nine months of 2022, according to U.S. Census Bureau data.翻译:然而，根据美国人口普查局的数据，今年的增速明显放缓，截至 9 月份的双向贸易流量较 2022 年前 9 个月减少了 1,040 亿美元，即 19%。

Wang and Raimondo also agreed to hold the first meeting of a commerce working group at the vice minister level in the first quarter of 2024, China's commerce ministry said.翻译:中国商务部表示，王毅和雷蒙多还同意于2024年第一季度召开副部长级商务工作组第一次会议。

Reporting by Joe Cash; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Mark Potter翻译:乔·卡什报道；克里斯托弗·库欣和马克·波特编辑

item.title: 对阿里巴巴取消云业务分拆的反应
item.description:
Hong Kong-listed shares of China's Alibaba Group (9988.HK) plunged 10% on Friday, wiping about $20 billion off its market value, after the company scrapped plans to spin off its cloud business.翻译:中国阿里巴巴集团（9988.HK）放弃剥离云业务的计划后，周五在香港上市的股价暴跌 10%，市值蒸发约 200 亿美元。

Alibaba said its decision to shelve the spin-off was due to uncertainties fuelled by U.S. curbs on exports to China of chips used in artificial intelligence applications.翻译:阿里巴巴表示，其决定搁置分拆的原因是美国限制向中国出口人工智能应用芯片，引发了不确定性。

Once Asia's most valuable stock worth around $830 billion in October 2020, the Hong Kong-listed shares fell more than 10% to a one-year low.翻译:2020 年 10 月，这家在香港上市的股票曾一度成为亚洲最有价值的股票，价值约为 8300 亿美元，但如今却下跌了 10% 以上，跌至一年来的最低点。

Following are what people are saying about the decision:翻译:以下是人们对这一决定的评价：

LI CHENGDONG, BEIJING-BASED TECH AND E-COMMERCE ANALYST:翻译:李成东，北京科技与电子商务分析师：

"I believe scrapping the cloud unit's IPO reflects a new development strategy implemented by the new leadership. This strategy is very different from the one set by previous leader Daniel Zhang.翻译:“我认为取消云部门的IPO反映了新领导层实施的新发展战略。这一战略与前任领导层设定的战略有很大不同。

"Such a move could further undermine investors’ confidence in Alibaba's management, which has already been shaken by the abrupt departure of Zhang earlier this year."翻译:“此举可能会进一步削弱投资者对阿里巴巴管理层的信心，今年早些时候张的突然离职已经动摇了投资者的信心。”

BRIAN WONG, FORMER ALIBABA EXECUTIVE AND AUTHOR OF 'THE TAO OF ALIBABA':翻译:阿里巴巴前高管、《阿里巴巴之道》作者黄宏明：

"Rather than spending the time on trying to spin out its Cloud Intelligence Business, the idea seems to be to double down on their attention and investment in the Cloud operations because with AI, timing is critical. If you miss the window, you might miss your opportunity to actually be a key player in the business.翻译:“我们的想法似乎是加倍关注和投资云运营，而不是花时间尝试分拆云智能业务，因为对于人工智能来说，时机至关重要。如果你错过了这个窗口，你可能会错过您有机会真正成为该行业的关键参与者。

"Honestly, look at the world we're in right now. With all the flux and uncertainty, it's easy to be reflexive and fall into a short-term mentality. But one of the hallmarks of Alibaba is that they do not let the fear of the investor reactions dictate whether they make a hard decision that is actually going to benefit the company in the long run. I saw that consistently while I was at the company, a willingness to take the short-term hit for the long-term gain. To me that's a hallmark of the company mindset."翻译:“老实说，看看我们现在所处的世界。充满了变化和不确定性，很容易条件反射并陷入短期心态。但阿里巴巴的标志之一是他们不会让恐惧投资者的反应决定了他们是否做出了一个从长远来看实际上对公司有利的艰难决定。我在公司期间一直看到，为了长期收益而愿意承受短期打击.对我来说，这是公司心态的标志。”

CHARLIE CHAI, 86RESEARCH:翻译:查理柴，86 研究：

"I think they are certainly exploring in the right direction, but certain assets may see better investor demand and fetch a more satisfactory valuation than others. In particular, I think it is quite understandable why investors have concerns about the original AliCloud IPO - growth and margins are both facing substantial headwinds and the competitive & geopolitical factors undermine visibility. Clearly not the best time for IPO.翻译:“我认为他们肯定在朝着正确的方向探索，但某些资产可能会比其他资产看到更好的投资者需求并获得更令人满意的估值。特别是，我认为投资者对最初的阿里云 IPO 的担忧是可以理解的 - 增长和增长利润率均面临巨大阻力，竞争和地缘政治因素削弱了知名度。显然不是 IPO 的最佳时机。

"Nonetheless, I think the group should be given credit for giving the idea the best effort. Eddie Wu taking over as the division chief, the end of the previously announced price war, and deconsolidation of DingTalk from AliCloud are all right moves signalling constructive strategies and addressing investor concerns. Too bad that they were not enough."翻译:“尽管如此，我认为该集团为这个想法付出了最大的努力，应该受到赞扬。吴艾迪接任部门负责人，之前宣布的价格战的结束，以及钉钉从阿里云的分拆，都是正确的举措，表明了建设性的战略并解决投资者的担忧。可惜的是，这些还不够。”

VEY-SERN LING, UNION BANCAIRE PRIVEE:翻译:VEY-SERN LING，UNION BANCAIR PRIVEE：

"With the advent of AI, and Cloud being critical infrastructure to deliver AI services, it would make sense to keep the unit within Alibaba as it can then potentially invest and deliver better shareholder returns over time. In short, I think prior decisions to restructure and IPO certain business units will have to be reassessed based on prevailing market conditions. The international business is one of the few Alibaba units that’s growing fast, which puts it in a better position to explore external funding."翻译:“随着人工智能的出现，以及云成为提供人工智能服务的关键基础设施，将该部门保留在阿里巴巴内部是有意义的，因为随着时间的推移，它可以潜在地投资并为股东带来更好的回报。简而言之，我认为之前的重组决定IPO 某些业务部门将不得不根据当前市场状况重新评估。国际业务是阿里巴巴为数不多的快速增长的业务部门之一，这使其能够更好地探索外部融资。”

Reporting By Casey Hall in Shanghai and Josh Ye in Hong Kong, Yelin Mo in Beijing; Compiled by Anne Marie Roantree; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman and Miral Fahmy翻译:上海Casey Hall、香港Josh Ye、北京Mo Yelin 报道；由安妮·玛丽·罗恩特里编译； Muralikumar Anantharaman 和 Miral Fahmy 编辑

item.title: 美国芬太尼交易后，中国警告不要销售用于麻醉药品的化学品
item.description:
China's narcotics control agency has warned against the manufacture and sale of substances that can be used to make illegal drugs, a day after President Xi Jinping said China would stem the export of items used to make the opioid fentanyl.翻译:就在习近平主席表示中国将阻止用于制造阿片类药物芬太尼的产品出口的第二天，中国禁毒机构对可用于制造非法毒品的物质的生产和销售发出警告。

In a circular issued on Thursday, the office of the China National Narcotics Control Commission also cautioned against the risk of running into the "long-arm jurisdiction" of foreign law enforcement agencies.翻译:在周四发布的通知中，中国国家禁毒委员会办公室还警告不要遭遇外国执法机构“长臂管辖”的风险。

The United States has long sought China's cooperation to stop an illicit flow of precursor chemicals used to make fentanyl, which is up to 50 times stronger than heroin and is increasingly mixed with other drugs, often with lethal results.翻译:美国长期以来一直寻求中国合作，制止用于制造芬太尼的前体化学品的非法流动，芬太尼的浓度比海洛因高出50倍，并且越来越多地与其他药物混合，往往会造成致命的结果。

At their summit on Wednesday in San Francisco, Xi and U.S. President Joe Biden agreed China would stem the export of items related to the production of fentanyl.翻译:在周三于旧金山举行的峰会上，习近平和美国总统乔·拜登一致同意，中国将阻止与芬太尼生产相关的产品出口。

Under the agreement, China will go directly after specific chemical companies that make fentanyl precursors, a senior U.S. official said.翻译:一位美国高级官员表示，根据协议，中国将直接打击生产芬太尼前体的特定化学公司。

In its circular, the narcotics agency warned that any person, or company, including postal and logistics firms, that is aware of the sale, transport or export of illegal drugs or precursor chemicals may face criminal charges or fines.翻译:禁毒机构在通告中警告称，任何了解销售、运输或出口非法毒品或前体化学品的个人或公司，包括邮政和物流公司，都可能面临刑事指控或罚款。

U.S. officials say small chemical businesses in China make precursor chemicals that are shipped to Mexico to produce illicit fentanyl. China says addiction and demand for the drug are U.S. domestic problems.翻译:美国官员表示，中国的小型化工企业生产前体化学品，然后运往墨西哥生产非法芬太尼。中国表示，对该药物的成瘾和需求是美国的国内问题。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑

item.title: 缅甸军方与叛乱分子争夺港口城镇
item.description:
Myanmar's military has launched attacks from the air and the sea to recapture a port town on the Bay of Bengal, an opposition alliance said on Friday, as junta forces face the fiercest offensive from their enemies in years.翻译:反对派联盟周五表示，缅甸军方已从空中和海上发起攻击，以夺回孟加拉湾的一个港口城镇，军政府部队面临着敌人多年来最猛烈的进攻。

The military, which seized power from an elected government in a 2021 coup, is battling a coordinated offensive launched last month by an alliance of three ethnic minority insurgent groups, as well as allied pro-democracy fighters who have taken up arms since the coup.翻译:在 2021 年政变中从民选政府手中夺取权力的军方正在与上个月由三个少数民族叛乱团体以及自政变以来拿起武器的亲民主战士联盟发起的协调一致的攻势作战。

"The military attacked Pauktaw town with helicopters and artillery fire from a navy ship after we conquered the police station of the town in the morning," the Three Brotherhood Alliance said on its Telegram channel, referring to the fighting in western Myanmar's Rakhine State on Thursday.翻译:三兄弟联盟在其 Telegram 频道上表示：“早上我们占领了包都镇的警察局后，军方用直升机和一艘海军舰艇的炮火对该镇进行了攻击”，指的是周四缅甸西部若开邦的战斗。

"In the evening, junta troops came into the town and shot and killed civilians," the alliance said.翻译:该联盟表示：“晚上，军政府军队进入该镇，枪杀平民。”

Reuters could not independently verify the report and a junta spokesperson did not respond to request for comment.翻译:路透社无法独立核实该报道，军政府发言人也没有回应置评请求。

Pauktaw is about 500 km (310 miles ) northwest of Myanmar's main city of Yangon.翻译:包都位于缅甸主要城市仰光西北约 500 公里（310 英里）处。

The offensive, which the insurgent alliance calls "Operation 1027" after the date it was launched, is the biggest the junta has faced in years.翻译:叛乱联盟在发起之日起将其称为“1027行动”，是军政府多年来面临的最大规模的攻势。

Three rebel groups, aligned with pro-democracy fighters and a parallel, pro-democracy civilian government, have captured several towns and military posts across the country.翻译:三个叛乱团体与亲民主战士和平行的亲民主文职政府结盟，占领了全国各地的多个城镇和军事哨所。

The Irrawaddy news portal, citing a resident of Pauktaw, said members of the Arakan Army (AA) guerrilla group had earlier taken control of the town.翻译:伊洛瓦底新闻门户网站援引包都一名居民的话说，若开军（AA）游击队成员早些时候已经控制了该镇。

"All the residents are running away. There is no one in the city, all the shops are closed," the resident said.翻译:“所有的居民都在逃跑。城里没有人，所有的商店都关门了，”该居民说。

Fighting has also broken out in Shan State on the border with China where the insurgents have pledged to wrest control of the area from the junta and eradicate online scam centres run illegally there.翻译:与中国接壤的掸邦也爆发了战斗，叛乱分子承诺从军政府手中夺取该地区的控制权，并根除那里非法运营的网络诈骗中心。

In the weeks before the clashes, Chinese officials called on the junta to take stronger action against the scam centres where Chinese and other foreign nationals have been known to be trapped as victims of human trafficking.翻译:在冲突发生前几周，中国官员呼吁军政府对诈骗中心采取更有力的行动，这些诈骗中心已知有中国人和其他外国人被困为人口贩运的受害者。

Hundreds of thousands of people have been trafficked to work in scam centres across Southeast Asia in recent years, including at least 120,000 in Myanmar, robbing strangers of their savings online in a fast-growing new kind of crime, the United Nations says.翻译:联合国表示，近年来，东南亚各地有数十万人被拐卖到诈骗中心工作，其中缅甸至少有 12 万人，通过网上抢夺陌生人的积蓄，这是一种快速增长的新型犯罪行为。

Junta spokesperson Zaw Min Tun accused the rebel alliance of trying to get China's support for their cause.翻译:军政府发言人佐敏吞指责叛军联盟试图获得中国对其事业的支持。

"China is really keen to eliminate online scam activities, and (the alliance) is using that situation with a strategy to gain benefits for their organisation," he said in a statement on Thursday.翻译:他在周四的一份声明中表示：“中国确实热衷于消除在线诈骗活动，（联盟）正在利用这种情况制定战略，为他们的组织谋取利益。”

Junta state media said on Friday it had handed three Chinese nationals accused of running scams over to China, while a fourth suspect shot himself after being captured.翻译:军政府官方媒体周五表示，已将三名被控诈骗的中国公民移交给中国，第四名嫌疑人在被捕后开枪自杀。

The Chinese government could not immediately be reached for comment.翻译:未能立即联系到中国政府置评。

Dozens of junta troops have surrendered in the fighting, according to rebel forces and a video verified by Reuters, and more have fled into neighbouring India.翻译:据叛军部队和路透社证实的一段视频称，数十名军政府士兵已在战斗中投降，还有更多人逃往邻国印度。

The junta says it is battling terrorists and has ordered all government staff and those with military experience to prepare to serve in case of emergency.翻译:军政府表示正在打击恐怖分子，并已命令所有政府工作人员和有军事经验的人员做好紧急情况下的服务准备。

Reporting by Reuters staff; writing by Kanupriya Kapoor; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:路透社工作人员的报道；卡努普里亚·卡普尔 (Kanupriya Kapoor) 撰写；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 中国预计下周将维持主要贷款利率不变
item.description:
China is widely expected to leave lending benchmark rates unchanged at a monthly fixing on Monday, after the central bank kept medium-term interbank rates steady and amid wider concerns about pressure on the yuan.翻译:在央行保持中期银行间利率稳定以及对人民币压力的广泛担忧之际，市场普遍预计中国周一将维持贷款基准利率不变。

The loan prime rate (LPR) normally charged to banks' best clients is calculated each month after 18 designated commercial banks submit proposed rates to the People's Bank of China (PBOC).翻译:通常向银行最佳客户收取的贷款报价利率（LPR）是在18家指定商业银行向中国人民银行（PBOC）提交建议利率后每月计算的。

In a poll of 26 market watchers, all participants predicted both the one-year LPR and the five-year tenor would stay unchanged.翻译:在对26名市场观察人士进行的调查中，所有参与者均预测一年期LPR和五年期LPR将保持不变。

Most new and outstanding loans in the world's second-largest economy are based on the one-year LPR, which stands at 3.45%, while the five-year rate influences the pricing of mortgages and is 4.20%.翻译:全球第二大经济体的大多数新增贷款和未偿还贷款均基于一年期LPR，为3.45%，而五年期利率则影响抵押贷款的定价，为4.20%。

"Pressure on some banks' net interest margins has not been significantly relieved," said Zhou Maohua, analyst at China Everbright Bank.翻译:光大银行分析师周茂华表示，部分银行净息差压力并未明显缓解。

"The changes in LPR are more affected by the MLF rate," Zhou said, expecting the LPR to stay unchanged this month.翻译:“LPR的变化更多地受到MLF利率的影响。”周表示，预计本月LPR将保持不变。

Market participants typically see changes in the MLF as a precursor to changes in the LPR.翻译:市场参与者通常将 MLF 的变化视为 LPR 变化的先兆。

The PBOC on Wednesday injected 1.45 trillion yuan ($200.12 billion) worth of one-year MLF loans into the banking system but kept the rates on those loans unchanged.翻译:中国人民银行周三向银行体系注入了价值1.45万亿元人民币（合2001.2亿美元）的一年期MLF贷款，但维持这些贷款利率不变。

The size of the liquidity injection exceeded market expectations and resulted in a net 600 billion yuan of cash injection into the banking system, the biggest monthly increase since December 2016.翻译:流动性注入规模超出市场预期，导致银行体系净注入现金6000亿元，创2016年12月以来最大单月增幅。

Expectations of steady LPR fixings also come as new bank lending in China fell less than expected in October from the previous month.翻译:由于中国 10 月份新增银行贷款环比降幅低于预期，LPR 定价稳定的预期也随之而来。

Some market watchers believe that a weakening yuan continues to limit the scope of monetary easing, as rate reductions widen the yield gap with the United States and other major economies, risking currency depreciation and capital outflows.翻译:一些市场观察人士认为，人民币贬值继续限制货币宽松的范围，因为降息会扩大与美国和其他主要经济体的收益率差距，带来货币贬值和资本外流的风险。

($1 = 7.2456 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2456 人民币）

Reporting by Winni Zhou and Wu Fang in Shanghai, Tom Westbrook in Singapore. Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:Winni Zhou 和 Wu Fang 在上海报道，Tom Westbrook 在新加坡报道。山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 分析师表示，中国需要动用“多重杠杆”来扭转房地产局面
item.description:
Summary:
  • Direct govt interventions is good news, but more steps needed, analysts say
  • Lifting buyer confidence key for reviving crisis-hit property sector
  • Government support measures don't go far enough to restore demand
翻译:概括：
  • 分析师表示，政府直接干预是个好消息，但需要采取更多措施
  • 提振买家信心是重振受危机打击的房地产行业的关键
  • 政府的支持措施不足以恢复需求

China's direct interventions to ease a cash crunch for crisis-hit property developers are a step in the right direction, but analysts say these actions must be complemented by stronger fiscal and monetary policies to shore up demand in the sector.翻译:中国为缓解受危机打击的房地产开发商的现金短缺而采取的直接干预措施是朝着正确方向迈出的一步，但分析人士表示，这些行动必须辅之以更强有力的财政和货币政策，以提振该行业的需求。

The extended slump in property sales, investment, and home prices last month has piled more pressure on authorities to step up efforts to prevent contagion across the broader financial sector.翻译:上个月房地产销售、投资和房价的持续​​低迷给当局带来了更大的压力，要求当局加大力度防止疫情蔓延到更广泛的金融领域。

China's economy has struggled to get back on solid footing despite the lifting of strict COVID curbs late last year, largely because the property sector has stumbled from one crisis to another in a major blow to consumer and investor confidence.翻译:尽管去年年底取消了严格的新冠疫情限制措施，但中国经济仍难以重新站稳脚跟，这主要是因为房地产行业从一场危机转向另一场危机，对消费者和投资者信心造成重大打击。

Rescuing select developers will not be enough in itself to cushion the economic impact of the downturn, analysts say, arguing that Beijing should consider supplementing it with other steps, including boosting fiscal spending and further loosening of monetary policy.翻译:分析师表示，救助特定开发商本身并不足以缓解经济低迷带来的经济影响，北京方面应考虑采取其他措施作为补充，包括增加财政支出和进一步放松货币政策。

Beijing needs to pull "multiple levers" at the same time to address the "vulnerabilities" in the financial system, local government financing, as well as consumer sentiment, said Edward Al-Hussainy, head of emerging market fixed income research at Columbia Threadneedle, which owns Country Garden bonds.翻译:Columbia Threadneedle 新兴市场固定收益研究主管爱德华·侯赛尼 (Edward Al-Hussainy) 表示，北京需要同时拉动“多个杠杆”来解决金融体系、地方政府融资以及消费者信心方面的“脆弱性”。持有碧桂园债券。

"When confidence is low, the only entity that can solve it is the government and I think the government has to solve it by being very aggressive, very visibly aggressive, with language like 'whatever it takes'", he said.翻译:他说：“当信心低迷时，唯一能够解决问题的实体就是政府，我认为政府必须采取非常激进、非常明显的激进态度，使用‘不惜一切代价’之类的措辞来解决这个问题。”

Shoring up confidence is the biggest challenge facing Beijing and is key to getting homebuyers spending again, which analysts says isn't likely to happen soon given an uncertain economic outlook.翻译:提振信心是北京面临的最大挑战，也是让购房者再次消费的关键，但分析师表示，鉴于经济前景不确定，这不太可能很快发生。

Investors got a brief respite last week after the largest state-owned shareholder of China Vanke (000002.SZ), stepped in to back the country's No. 2 developer, with over $1.4 billion of "market tools".翻译:上周，万科(000002.SZ)最大国有股东以超过14亿美元的“市场工具”介入支持中国第二大开发商后，投资者得到了短暂的喘息机会。

Separately, Reuters reported last week that the central government was working on a plan to bail out property giant Country Garden (2007.HK), whose worsening financial woes have renewed concerns about broader contagion risk.翻译:另外，路透社上周报道称，中央政府正在制定一项救助房地产巨头碧桂园（2007.HK）的计划，该公司日益恶化的财务困境再次引发了人们对更广泛蔓延风险的担忧。

In the last few months the government's support measures for the property sector, which accounts for roughly a quarter of the Chinese economy, included easing curbs on home purchases and cutting mortgage borrowing costs.翻译:过去几个月，政府对占中国经济约四分之一的房地产行业采取了支持措施，包括放松购房限制和降低抵押贷款成本。

Beijing has so far resisted a return to the big-bang stimulus of the past that led to a massive build up in debt which it is still struggling to unwind, while it fears large scale monetary stimulus will hammer an already weakened yuan currency and intensify capital outflows.翻译:迄今为止，北京方面一直拒绝恢复过去的大规模刺激措施，这种刺激措施导致了债务的大量积累，目前仍在努力摆脱债务，同时它担心大规模的货币刺激措施将打击本已疲软的人民币，并加剧资本流动。流出。

Still, Morgan Stanley said in a report this week that Beijing was likely to step up central government-led fiscal stimulus, focusing on urban village rebuilding, social housing construction and green capital expenditure.翻译:尽管如此，摩根士丹利本周在一份报告中表示，北京可能会加大中央政府主导的财政刺激力度，重点关注城中村重建、保障性住房建设和绿色资本支出。

China's Central Economic Work Conference next month is also expected to "signal a more flexible monetary policy", it added.

'ONE BIG HIT'

The property sector plunged into an unprecedented crisis in 2021 after a regulatory crackdown to rein in a debt-fuelled building boom tightened liquidity in the industry and sparked defaults among developers.翻译:2021 年，为遏制债务驱动的建筑热潮而进行的监管打击导致该行业流动性收紧并引发开发商违约，房地产行业陷入前所未有的危机。

Reuters reported last week that Chinese authorities have asked domestic financial behemoth Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in Country Garden. That report was denied by Ping An.翻译:路透社上周报道称，中国当局已要求国内金融巨头平安保险集团控股碧桂园。中国平安否认了这一报道。

The Chinese authorities may want to allow Country Garden's rescue by Ping An to instil confidence in the sector, said Elliot Hentov, head of macro policy research at asset manager State Street Global Advisors.翻译:资产管理公司道富环球顾问公司(State Street Global Advisors)宏观政策研究主管埃利奥特·亨托夫(Elliot Hentov)表示，中国当局可能希望平安对碧桂园进行救助，以增强对该行业的信心。

"They recognise that none of the measures... like softening mortgage conditionality, liquidity provision - have been enough to restore confidence so they might feel like they need one big hit," he said, referring to the Reuters report on the Country Garden bailout plan.翻译:他在谈到路透社关于碧桂园救助计划的报道时表示，“他们认识到，这些措施……如放宽抵押贷款条件、流动性供应等，都不足以恢复信心，因此他们可能觉得需要一次重击。”计划。

A government-led bailout of a distressed developer would be positive as it would reflect Beijing's determination to defuse the debt crisis, restructuring experts, investors and developers say, though they reckon it would require careful manoeuvring to manage the impact on the white knight.翻译:重组专家、投资者和开发商表示，政府牵头对陷入困境的开发商进行救助将是积极的，因为这将反映北京化解债务危机的决心，尽管他们认为这需要谨慎的操作来控制对白衣骑士的影响。

Regardless of the final outcome, senior executives at two mid-sized defaulted developers said the Country Garden deal would have little impact on them, as a government bailout would likely target only the systematically important firms.翻译:无论最终结果如何，两家中型违约开发商的高管表示，碧桂园交易对他们影响不大，因为政府救助可能只针对具有系统重要性的公司。

"A deal could restore some investor confidence in the capital market. But a recovery in confidence in the property market will require people buying home, not rescuing a company," said Steven Xu, president of Hong Kong-based Harmonia Capital.翻译:“这笔交易可能会恢复一些投资者对资本市场的信心。但要恢复对房地产市场的信心，需要人们买房，而不是拯救一家公司，”香港Harmonia Capital总裁史蒂文·徐(Steven Xu)表示。

"You need to fix the macro environment first; if you don't earn enough how do you buy a property?," said Xu, whose firm holds China property dollar bonds.翻译:“你需要首先解决宏观环境；如果你赚不到足够的钱，你怎么买房产？”徐说，他的公司持有中国房地产美元债券。

Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday China plans to provide at least 1 trillion yuan ($138 billion) of low-cost financing to the nation's urban village renovation and affordable housing programs.翻译:彭博新闻社周二报道称，中国计划为国家城中村改造和保障性住房项目提供至少 1 万亿元人民币（1,380 亿美元）的低成本融资。

"The move, if true, indicates regulator's increasing stance to help the sector. We think that the policy will indirectly help to provide liquidity to developers," GS-CIBM Securities head of China research Raymond Cheng.翻译:“这一举措如果属实，表明监管机构越来越愿意帮助该行业。我们认为该政策将间接帮助为开发商提供流动性，”高盛银行证券中国研究部主管郑雷蒙（Raymond Cheng）表示。

Still, additional broad-based monetary policy easing was needed to facilitate the large amount of government bond issuance and improve sentiment towards growth, Goldman Sachs said in a note, referring to the new financing report.翻译:高盛在一份报告中提到新的融资报告时表示，仍然需要进一步放松基础广泛的货币政策，以促进大量政府债券的发行并改善对增长的信心。

($1 = 7.2583 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2583 人民币）

Reporting by Clare Jim in Hong Kong, Davide Barbuscia in New York, Karin Strohecker in London; additional reporting by Summer Zhen in Hong Kong and Rae Wee in Singapore; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee & Shri Navaratnam翻译:Clare Jim 在香港、Davide Barbuscia 在纽约、Karin Strohecker 在伦敦报道； Summer Zen 在香港和 Rae Wee 在新加坡的补充报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Shri Navaratnam

item.title: 第五点：黑色星期五（即将）到来
item.description:
U.S. retailers are gearing up for Black Friday, marking the start of the shopping season that follows the Thanksgiving holiday, while business activity data should gauge the temperature elsewhere.翻译:美国零售商正在为黑色星期五做准备，这标志着感恩节假期后购物季的开始，而商业活动数据应该可以衡量其他地方的气温。

Britain's budget update is in the spotlight, while the yen might get some breathing space and Argentina heads for a key election.翻译:英国的预算更新成为人们关注的焦点，而日元可能会得到一些喘息的空间，而阿根廷即将举行关键选举。

Here's your week ahead in world markets from Lewis Krauskopf in New York, Kevin Buckland in Tokyo, and Naomi Rovnick, Dhara Ranasinghe and Karin Strohecker in London.

1/ BARGAIN HUNTING

The crucial holiday shopping season kicks off with Black Friday on Nov. 24 at a time when investors are questioning whether the consumer-driven U.S. economy can remain resilient.翻译:关键的假日购物季于 11 月 24 日黑色星期五拉开帷幕，此时投资者正在质疑消费者驱动的美国经济能否保持弹性。

This year's Black Friday comes as Americans grapple with soaring interest rates and inflation that, while easing, remains above the Federal Reserve's 2% target.翻译:今年的黑色星期五正值美国人努力应对不断飙升的利率和通胀，尽管通胀有所缓解，但仍高于美联储 2% 的目标。

Already, data for October showed U.S. retail sales fell, pointing to slowing demand, although the decline was less than expected.翻译:十月份的数据已经显示美国零售销售下降，表明需求放缓，尽管降幅小于预期。

There's also likely to be plenty of interest in chip company Nvidia, which releases its latest earnings report on Nov. 21. It is the last of the results in the earnings season from the Magnificent 7 megacap companies, whose massive share gains this year have led equity indexes higher.

2/ SOFT VS HARD

Soft or hard landing? For sure, compelling arguments can be made for both. The European Commission expects the euro zone will avoid technical recession; Britain just sidestepped the start of one.翻译:软着陆还是硬着陆？当然，两者都可以提出令人信服的论据。欧盟委员会预计欧元区将避免技术性衰退；英国刚刚回避了其中一个的开始。

The forward-looking flash November PMIs due out globally should help investors assess recession risks and how quickly rate cuts will begin.翻译:全球即将发布的前瞻性 11 月采购经理人指数 (PMI) 应该有助于投资者评估衰退风险以及降息的开始速度。

The euro zone PMI is already below the 50 number, suggesting economic activity is contracting. It is the same in Britain, while the U.S. Oct manufacturing PMI contracted sharply.翻译:欧元区PMI已经低于50，表明经济活动正在收缩。英国也是如此，而美国10月制造业PMI则大幅萎缩。

Bond heavyweight PIMCO sees the probability of a U.S. recession within one year at 50%. Market pricing for rate cuts suggests traders reckon economic growth will slow fast enough for the Fed and European Central Bank to switch to easing mode. And of course soft landing hopes could vanish fast if inflation eases more quickly and unemployment rises fast.

3/ 11 DOWNING STREET

UK politics has been dramatic, with Prime Minister Rishi Sunak having fired his interior minister, moved former leader David Cameron back into government and reshuffled other top roles.翻译:英国政治充满戏剧性，首相里希·苏纳克解雇了内政部长，将前领导人戴维·卡梅伦调回政府，并重新调整了其他高级职位。

Finance minister Jeremy Hunt will now change gear with his Nov. 22 Autumn Statement, focusing on boosting growth ahead of an expected 2024 election.翻译:财政部长杰里米·亨特 (Jeremy Hunt) 现在将在 11 月 22 日的秋季声明中改变策略， 重点关注在预期的 2024 年大选之前促进经济增长。

Analysts predict the government, hamstrung by a stagnant economy and high debt, won't make big investment pledges.翻译:分析师预测，由于经济停滞和债务高企，政府不会做出大规模投资承诺。

Still, Hunt looks set to trim taxes for voters and businesses, offering some relief to the many Conservative lawmakers alarmed at the opposition Labour Party's big opinion poll lead. He could also downgrade near-term borrowing expectations, temporarily boosting gilts.翻译:尽管如此，亨特似乎仍将削减选民和企业的税收，这让许多因反对党工党在民意调查中大幅领先而感到震惊的保守党议员松了口气。他还可能下调近期借贷预期，暂时提振英国国债。

Natwest says the UK may issue 10% more debt in 2024-2025 than in this fiscal year - a development that would amplify long-term concerns about gilt market oversupply.

4/ DEATH, TAXES, WEAK YEN

There's an air of inevitability about a weaker yen, even with the Bank of Japan increasingly hinting at an end to ultra-loose policy and greater investor certainty that the Fed is done tightening.翻译:尽管日本央行越来越多地暗示将结束超宽松政策，而且投资者更加确信美联储已经完成紧缩政策，但日元走软仍不可避免。

After pulling back from the brink of 152 per dollar at the start of the week, receiving a lifeline from cooling U.S. inflation data, the yen was back to the weaker side of 151 a day later. It's déjà vu for traders, who saw support from weak U.S. payrolls numbers on Nov. 3 last only as long as the weekend.翻译:本周初，日元从 1 美元兑 152 美元的边缘回落，并因美国通胀数据降温而获得救命稻草，一天后又回到 151 美元兑较弱的一边。对于交易员来说，这似乎是一种似曾相识的感觉，他们看到 11 月 3 日疲弱的美国非农就业数据带来的支撑只持续到周末。

While gaping Japan-U.S. rate differentials do not bode well for the yen, the shift in policy directions should at least give forward-thinking markets some pause.翻译:虽然日美利差扩大对日元来说不是好兆头，但政策方向的转变至少应该让具有前瞻性的市场稍稍停顿一下。

As long as that's not the case, pressure is on the Kishida cabinet since a weak yen is unpopular politically. And that means Tokyo is never too far from the intervention trigger.

5/ PHOTO FINISH?

Argentines elect a new president on Sunday in a closely fought race pitching center-left Peronist economy chief Sergio Massa against libertarian outsider Javier Milei and polls suggest a likely photo finish.翻译:周日，阿根廷人在一场激烈的竞争中选出了新总统，中左翼庇隆主义经济部长塞尔吉奥·马萨与自由主义局外人哈维尔·米莱展开激烈角逐，民意调查显示，结果很可能是平局。

They offer two wildly different visions for South America's No. 2 economy: Milei's potentially painful shock therapy for the embattled country that has run out of FX reserves, inflation running at over 140% and faces recession. Pragmatist Massa pledges a unity government and more gradual change to solve the crisis that has worsened on his watch.翻译:他们为南美第二大经济体提供了两种截然不同的愿景：米莱对这个陷入困境的国家实施潜在的痛苦休克疗法，该国外汇储备已耗尽，通货膨胀率超过 140%，并面临衰退。实用主义者马萨承诺组建联合政府并进行更加渐进的改革，以解决在他任内恶化的危机。

Investors are bracing for rocky times, with Argentina's crucial $44 billion IMF programme on the ropes and international bonds priced at deeply distressed levels.翻译:投资者正准备迎接艰难时期，阿根廷 440 亿美元的国际货币基金组织关键计划陷入困境，而国际债券的定价也处于深陷困境的水平。

And there's more election-induced volatility ahead in emerging markets with Egypt, Taiwan, South Africa and India just some facing key ballots in coming months.翻译:新兴市场未来将出现更多由选举引发的波动，埃及、台湾、南非和印度等新兴市场将在未来几个月面临关键投票。

item.title: 阿里巴巴分拆云业务的态度大转变，市值缩水200亿美元
item.description:
Alibaba Group's (9988.HK) Hong Kong shares slumped 10% on Friday after it scrapped plans to spin off its cloud business, citing uncertainties fuelled by U.S. curbs on exports to China of semiconductors used in artificial intelligence applications.翻译:阿里巴巴集团(9988.HK)香港股市周五下跌10%，此前该公司放弃了分拆云业务的计划，理由是美国限制向中国出口用于人工智能应用的半导体，引发了不确定性。

The drop, potentially its biggest one-day fall in more than a year, wiped about $20 billion off the Chinese tech giant's market value.翻译:此次跌幅可能是一年多来最大单日跌幅，这家中国科技巨头的市值蒸发了约 200 亿美元。

It was the first market reaction in Asia since the stunning strategy reversal was announced late on Thursday. The company's U.S. listed securities closed down 9%.翻译:这是自周四晚间宣布令人震惊的策略逆转以来亚洲市场的首次反应。该公司在美国上市的证券收盘下跌 9%。

"The cancellation of a full spin-off of AliCloud is a negative surprise," said Nomura analyst Shi Jialong in a note.翻译:野村证券分析师史家龙在一份报告中表示：“取消全面分拆阿里云是一个负面的意外。”

Alibaba's concerns over the U.S. export curbs announced by Washington in October come on the heels of similar worries raised this week by Chinese social media and gaming company Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) which said the restrictions would force it to seek domestically produced alternatives.翻译:阿里巴巴对华盛顿10月份宣布的美国出口限制感到担忧，此前中国社交媒体和游戏公司腾讯控股(0700.HK)本周也提出了类似的担忧，该公司表示，这些限制将迫使其寻求国产替代品。

Alibaba, once Asia's most valuable stock, was worth around $830 billion at its peak in October 2020 but is now valued at less than one fourth, as the e-commerce company took centre-stage in Beijing's technology sector crackdown and as the Chinese economy slowed.翻译:阿里巴巴曾经是亚洲最有价值的股票，在 2020 年 10 月高峰时市值约为 8,300 亿美元，但随着这家电子商务公司在北京科技行业打击行动中占据中心地位以及中国经济放缓，目前估值不到四分之一。

The latest Alibaba news underscores broader hurdles facing China's tech companies, with the export curbs making it harder for them to get crucial chip supplies from U.S. companies.翻译:阿里巴巴的最新消息凸显了中国科技公司面临的更广泛障碍，出口限制使它们更难从美国公司获得关键的芯片供应。

In March, Alibaba announced plans to carve out the cloud business as part of the biggest restructuring in its 24-year history that broke the company up into six units.翻译:今年 3 月，阿里巴巴宣布计划开拓云业务，这是其 24 年历史上最大的重组的一部分，该重组将公司分为六个部门。

Analysts had estimated then the cloud division could be worth $41-$60 billion but had warned that its listing could attract scrutiny from both Chinese and overseas regulators due to the reams of data it manages.翻译:分析师当时估计该云部门的价值可能为 41 至 600 亿美元，但警告称，由于其管理的大量数据，其上市可能会引起中国和海外监管机构的审查。

The Hangzhou-based company, in announcing its quarterly earnings on Thursday, also put on hold a listing plan for its Freshippo groceries business.翻译:这家总部位于杭州的公司在周四公布季度业绩时，还搁置了盒马鲜生业务的上市计划。

Analysts also said news from Thursday that the family trust of Alibaba co-founder and former chief Jack Ma planned to sell 10 million American Depository Shares in Alibaba was likely impacting shares.翻译:分析师还表示，周四有消息称，阿里巴巴联合创始人、前首席执行官马云的家族信托计划出售阿里巴巴的 1000 万股美国存托股票，这可能会对股价产生影响。

"Despite no longer being involved in operations, we believe (Ma's) selling Alibaba at a depressed valuation may hurt sentiment," UBS analyst Kenneth Fong said in a note.

FOCUS ON AI

On Thursday, Alibaba Chairman Joseph Tsai told a post-earnings call that the company would now focus on growing the cloud business and providing investment for its artificial intelligence (AI) drivers.翻译:周四，阿里巴巴董事长蔡崇信在财报后电话会议上表示，该公司现在将专注于发展云业务并为其人工智能（AI）驱动程序提供投资。

Some analysts said the reversal on the spin-off would assist Alibaba's AI push.翻译:一些分析师表示，分拆的逆转将有助于阿里巴巴的人工智能发展。

"The company believes the chip ban might materially and adversely affect its ability to offer products and services in the longer term. But (it) also points to the increasing importance of retaining the cloud unit given the surging demand for AI computing in China," said US Tiger Research analyst Bo Pei.翻译:“该公司认为，从长远来看，芯片禁令可能对其提供产品和服务的能力产生重大不利影响。但它也表明，鉴于中国对人工智能计算的需求激增，保留云部门变得越来越重要。”美国Tiger Research分析师裴博表示。

Alibaba reported second-quarter revenue of 224.79 billion yuan ($31.01 billion), in line with the 224.32 billion expected by analysts, LSEG data showed.翻译:伦敦证券交易所数据显示，阿里巴巴第二季度营收为人民币 2,247.9 亿元（合 310.1 亿美元），与分析师预期的 2,243.2 亿元一致。

Eddie Wu, chief executive of Alibaba, detailed the company's future strategy on the call, saying that each of its businesses would face the market more independently and that they would conduct a strategic review to distinguish between "core" and "non-core" businesses.翻译:阿里巴巴首席执行官埃迪·吴(Eddie Wu)在电话会议上详细介绍了公司未来的战略，称其各项业务将更加独立地面对市场，并将进行战略审查，以区分“核心”和“非核心”业务。

The company said it will press ahead with a listing of Alibaba's logistics arm, Cainiao, which applied for a Hong Kong initial public offering in September.翻译:该公司表示，将推进阿里巴巴旗下物流子公司菜鸟的上市，该公司已于 9 月申请在香港首次公开募股。

It is also preparing for external fundraising for its international digital commerce unit that houses overseas platforms such as Lazada and Alibaba.com.翻译:它还准备为其国际数字商务部门筹集外部资金，该部门拥有Lazada和阿里巴巴等海外平台。

item.title: 奢侈品公司瞄准中国最富有的人群寻求增长，排他性成为游戏的名称
item.description:
The world's biggest luxury brands seeking growth in their second-largest market China are all courting the likes of wealthy entrepreneur Diana Wang.翻译:寻求在第二大市场中国实现增长的全球最大奢侈品牌都在向富有的企业家戴安娜·王(Diana Wang)等人示好。

Shanghai-based Wang, an investor who also owns a namesake fashion label, is an avid collector of fine jewellery who regularly shops at Cartier, Tiffany and Chopard, among others.翻译:居住在上海的王先生是一位投资者，同时拥有同名时尚品牌，也是一位狂热的高级珠宝收藏家，经常在卡地亚、蒂芙尼和萧邦等品牌购物。

She is also what luxury companies call a VIC, or very important client, a segment of the market they are increasingly targeting as China's post-pandemic economic slowdown dries up the spending power of the once-aspirational middle-class that for years generated the bulk of their revenue growth.翻译:她也是奢侈品公司所称的“VIC”（即非常重要的客户），随着中国疫情后的经济放缓，导致曾经雄心勃勃的中产阶级的消费能力枯竭，他们越来越多地瞄准这一细分市场。他们的收入增长。

Last month, Wang attended a gala dinner hosted by Tiffany, owned by the world's biggest luxury firm LVMH (LVMH.PA), which also launched its new collection of high jewellery with private sales appointments for select clients.翻译:上个月，王健林出席了世界最大奢侈品公司路威酩轩(LVMH.PA)旗下蒂芙尼 (Tiffany) 举办的晚宴，该晚宴还推出了全新高级珠宝系列，并为精选客户提供私人销售预约。

"Luxury brands offer you this event experience, this personal experience and it makes you feel privileged," Wang told Reuters. "It's a big part of what makes me want to buy the brand."翻译:“奢侈品牌为你提供这种活动体验、这种个人体验，它让你感到荣幸，”王告诉路透社。 “这是让我想购买这个品牌的一个重要原因。”

The lack of a strong rebound in luxury demand following China's post-pandemic re-opening has spooked investors, adding to jitters about the industry's prospects.翻译:中国疫情后重新开放后，奢侈品需求缺乏强劲反弹，令投资者感到恐慌，加剧了对该行业前景的担忧。

Shares in LVMH are down around 17% since July, while Richemont (CFR.S) is 24% lower. This week, Burberry (BRBY.L) also flagged low double-digit growth due to a slowdown in luxury spending globally, and in China.翻译:自 7 月以来，LVMH 的股价下跌了约 17%，而历峰集团(CFR.S)的股价则下跌了 24%。本周，由于全球和中国的奢侈品消费放缓，巴宝莉(BRBY.L)也实现了两位数的低增长。

To overcome, brands are focusing on selling fewer, more valuable items, relying on the 5% of luxury consumers who, according to HSBC analysts, account for more than 35% of their sales in China.翻译:为了克服这个问题，各品牌正专注于销售更少、更有价值的商品，依赖于 5% 的奢侈品消费者，据汇丰银行分析师称，这些消费者占其在中国销售额的 35% 以上。

Offering perks such as exclusive access and meet-the-designer events to this handful of clients is a tried-and-tested strategy for luxury brands globally, but not one that they have employed as much in the past in China, where mass events aimed at raising brand awareness and whetting the luxury appetites of new consumers were more the norm.翻译:为这少数客户提供独家访问权和设计师见面会等福利，对于全球奢侈品牌来说是一种久经考验的策略，但他们过去在中国没有采用过如此多的策略，因为在中国，大型活动的目标是提高品牌知名度和激发新消费者的奢侈品胃口已成为常态。

From 2019 to the beginning of 2022, China's domestic luxury sales doubled and some brands recorded year-on-year growth rates of 40-60% with middle class consumers accounting for "more than half" of that growth, according to Jacques Roizen, managing director of consulting at Digital Luxury Group.翻译:雅克·罗伊森 (Jacques Roizen) 表示，从 2019 年到 2022 年初，中国国内奢侈品销量翻了一番，一些品牌同比增长率达到 40-60%，其中中产阶级消费者占增长的“一半以上”。数字奢侈品集团咨询总监。

Now, a property crisis and record-high youth unemployment have forced high-end retailers from Chanel to Cartier-owner Richemont and Gucci-parent Kering (PRTP.PA) to compete for the discretionary spend of those fewer, wealthier customers still keen to treat themselves.翻译:现在，房地产危机和创纪录的青年失业率迫使高端零售商从香奈儿 (Chanel) 到卡地亚 (Cartier) 母公司历峰集团 (Richemont) 和古驰 (Gucci) 母公司开云集团 (Kering ) (PRTP.PA) 等高端零售商，争夺那些数量较少但仍热衷于接待的富裕客户的可自由支配支出。他们自己。

"It's not only about advertising and communication," said Jean-Marc Duplaix, chief financial officer and deputy chief executive of Kering, referring to company investments to woo shoppers across the spectrum globally. "It's more broadly about how we engage with customers."

INTIMATE & EXCLUSIVE

Making Chinese VICs feel important is central to that engagement.翻译:让中国维州人感到自己很重要是这种参与的核心。

At the Shanghai gala, Tiffany made sure a celebrity was sat at every table, Wang said. Versace, owned by Capri Holdings which is in the midst of a $8.5 billion takeover by Tapestry (TPR.N), also recently held an intimate dinner for about 40 people at the historic Bund with designer Donatella Versace.翻译:王说，在上海的晚会上，蒂芙尼确保每张桌子上都坐着一位名人。 Capri Holdings 旗下的 Versace 正在被 Tapestry (TPR.N)以 85 亿美元的价格收购，该公司最近还在历史悠久的外滩与设计师 Donatella Versace 举办了一场约 40 人的亲密晚宴。

Gucci, Chanel and Dior have also set aside more retail space in Shanghai exclusively for their wealthiest clients.翻译:古驰（Gucci）、香奈儿（Chanel）和迪奥（Dior）还在上海专门为其最富有的客户预留了更多零售空间。

"We pay a lot of attention to the details and the anchorage to local culture," said Cartier Chief Executive Cyrille Vigneron. The brand will hold its annual entrepreneurship awards for women in Shenzhen in May.翻译:卡地亚首席执行官西里尔·维涅龙 (Cyrille Vigneron) 表示：“我们非常注重细节以及对当地文化的认同。”该品牌将于5月在深圳举办年度女性创业奖。

Executives at rival LVMH are also keen for that local edge, with Louis Vuitton recently opening a pop-up bookstore and cafe in Shanghai with a billboard in the local dialect and also launching a Mandarin-language podcast.

FEEDING THE LUXURY HABIT

Even as they narrow their focus, luxury brands remain optimistic about the potential in China, which is forecast to account for almost 40% of global luxury sales by 2030, according to consultants Bain.翻译:尽管奢侈品牌缩小了关注范围，但它们仍对中国的潜力持乐观态度。咨询公司贝恩表示，预计到 2030 年，中国将占全球奢侈品销量的近 40%。

And unlike foreign financial firms and companies in other industries which are shrinking their presence in China as geopolitical tensions rise and "derisking" takes precedence over potential market opportunities, many luxury companies say they are here to stay.翻译:随着地缘政治紧张局势的加剧以及“去风险”优先于潜在的市场机会，外国金融公司和其他行业的公司正在缩小在中国的业务，而许多奢侈品公司表示，他们将继续留下来。

"We think medium and long-term development potential remains strong," said Eric du Halgouet, executive president of finance at Hermes, whose Birkin handbag is a coveted hallmark of wealth.翻译:爱马仕 (Hermes) 财务执行总裁埃里克·杜·哈尔古埃 (Eric du Halgouet) 表示：“我们认为中长期发展潜力依然强劲。”他的柏金包是财富的令人垂涎的标志。

Luxury consultant Mario Ortelli said several luxury firms are hedging their bets on China by also expanding their global footprint. This year has also seen many events and openings in South Korea, Japan and Thailand, as well as China.翻译:奢侈品顾问马里奥·奥尔泰利(Mario Ortelli)表示，一些奢侈品公司正在通过扩大全球足迹来对冲中国的赌注。今年，韩国、日本、泰国以及中国也举办了许多活动和开业。

"But you still need to invest in your biggest market and one that is an engine of growth," Ortelli said. "The only way for luxury companies to protect themselves is to make your brand as desirable as possible so you are the last one that a cost-cutting customer will stop buying."翻译:“但你仍然需要投资于你最大的市场，也是增长引擎，”奥泰利说。 “奢侈品公司保护自己的唯一方法就是让你的品牌尽可能受欢迎，这样你就成为最后一个因为削减成本而停止购买的品牌。”

As China's economic growth sputters, even VICs like Wang say they are thinking more carefully about the value of the luxury goods they are buying. That, however, isn't necessarily bad news for retailers.翻译:随着中国经济增长放缓，就连像王这样的维多利亚州人也表示，他们正在更加仔细地考虑所购买奢侈品的价值。然而，这对零售商来说并不一定是坏消息。

"We will think twice or three times now before spending more money than usual," Wang said. "Though I wouldn't say we will stop buying, it's become a habit now."翻译:王说：“在花比平常更多的钱之前，我们现在会三思而后行。” “虽然我不会说我们会停止购买，但现在这已经成为一种习惯。”

Reporting by Mimosa Spencer and Casey Hall; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:米莫萨·斯宾塞和凯西·霍尔的报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑

item.title: 由于收益率和石油下跌，亚洲股市每周上涨
item.description:
Summary:
  • Asian stock markets :
  • Asia stocks ex-Japan up 2.8% for the week so far
  • Oil prices near four-month low after steep sell off
  • Bonds rally as softer U.S. data hardens rate cut bets
翻译:概括：
  • 亚洲股市：
  • 截至目前，除日本外的亚洲股市本周上涨 2.8%
  • 油价在大幅抛售后接近四个月低点
  • 美国数据疲软强化降息押注，债券上涨

Asian shares took a breather on Friday as a batch of softer U.S. economic data took some of the steam out of Wall Street, but also boosted bonds in a big way while slugging oil prices in a boon for the inflation outlook.翻译:周五，亚洲股市稍作喘息，美国一系列疲软的经济数据令华尔街失去了一些动力，但也大幅提振了债券价格，同时打压油价，有利于通胀前景。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) eased 0.67% from a two-month high, but still up 2.7% for the week.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)从两个月高点下跌 0.67%，但本周仍上涨 2.7%。

Both Brent and U.S. crude slid almost 5% on Thursday to four-month lows in a move that was blamed on economic and supply concerns, though technical selling likely played a part when the $80 bulwark broke.翻译:布伦特原油和美国原油周四均下跌近 5%，跌至四个月低点，此举被归咎于经济和供应担忧，尽管 80 美元堡垒破裂时技术性抛售可能发挥了作用。

Dealers suspected algorithmic and trend-following funds drove the speculative sell off with much of the losses coming in just a single hour of trade.翻译:交易商怀疑算法和趋势跟踪基金推动了投机性抛售，大部分损失发生在短短一个小时的交易时间内。

Brent was last up 12 cents at $77.54 a barrel, and a world away from the $97.69 top hit in late September, while U.S. crude edged up 13 cents to $73.03.翻译:布伦特原油最后上涨 12 美分，至每桶 77.54 美元，距离 9 月底触及的 97.69 美元高点相差甚远，而美国原油小幅上涨 13 美分，至每桶 73.03 美元。

Whatever the cause, the rout should put added downward pressure on consumer prices across the globe and reinforce expectations of policy easing next year.翻译:无论原因是什么，这场暴跌都应该给全球消费者价格带来更大的下行压力，并强化明年政策放松的预期。

Adding to the disinflationary theme was commentary from Walmart (WMT.N) executives that costs were "more in check" and they were planning on cutting prices for the holiday season.翻译:沃尔玛（WMT.N）高管评论称，成本“得到了更多控制”，并且他们计划在假期期间降价，这进一步加剧了通货紧缩的主题。

Equity investors were not as impressed with the idea of margin compression and knocked Walmart shares down 8%, while a drop in energy stocks dragged on the S&P 500.翻译:股票投资者对利润压缩的想法并不感兴趣，导致沃尔玛股价下跌 8%，而能源股的下跌也拖累了标准普尔 500 指数。

On Friday, S&P 500 futures were up 0.08%, while Nasdaq futures edged 0.07% lower. EUROSTOXX 50 futures gained 0.35% and FTSE futures 0.24%.翻译:周五，标准普尔 500 指数期货上涨 0.08%，纳斯达克指数期货小幅下跌 0.07%。欧洲斯托克 50 指数期货上涨 0.35%，富时指数期货上涨 0.24%。

Japan's Nikkei (.N225) added 0.1%, to be 2.8% firmer for the week, helped by reassurance from the Bank of Japan that it was sticking with its super loose policy.翻译:日本日经指数(.N225)上涨 0.1%，本周上涨 2.8%，这得益于日本央行保证将坚持其超级宽松政策。

Chinese blue chips (.CSI300) were 0.6% lower, having missed on the general rally so far this week. Alibaba Group's (9988.HK) Hong Kong shares slumped 10% after it scrapped plans to spin off its cloud business.翻译:中国蓝筹股(.CSI300)下跌 0.6%，错过了本周迄今为止的总体反弹。 阿里巴巴集团(9988.HK)放弃剥离云业务的计划后，港股下跌10%。

Sentiment in Asia had been supported by the apparent easing of tensions between the United States and China, with the Chinese press lauding the meeting between President Xi Jinping and President Joe Biden.翻译:亚洲的情绪受到美国和中国之间紧张局势明显缓和的支撑，中国媒体对习近平主席和乔·拜登总统之间的会晤表示赞赏。

Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida also held talks with Xi at the APEC summit.

COUNTING ON CUTS

Bond markets were still cheering this week's benign U.S. inflation report, with futures now pricing in almost zero chance of another rate hike from the Federal Reserve and a 34% probability it might ease as early as March.翻译:债券市场仍在为本周良性的美国通胀报告欢呼，目前期货定价美联储再次加息的可能性几乎为零，而最早在 3 月份放宽利率的可能性为 34%。

The market is pricing in 98 basis points of cuts next year, compared with 73 basis points a week ago.翻译:市场预计明年将降息 98 个基点，而一周前为 73 个基点。

"With labor market activity slowing and further disinflation expected, we see the Fed on hold before starting to lower rates in the second half of 2024 to avoid a recession," wrote analysts at JPMorgan in a note.翻译:摩根大通分析师在一份报告中写道：“随着劳动力市场活动放缓和预期进一步通货紧缩，我们预计美联储将按兵不动，然后在 2024 年下半年开始降息以避免经济衰退。”

"We forecast the policy rate to drop 100 basis points in 2H24 to end the year at 4.5%, before settling on hold at 3.5% by 1Q25."翻译:“我们预计政策利率将在 2024 年下半年下降 100 个基点，年底达到 4.5%，然后在 2025 年第一季度保持在 3.5%。”

Treasury investors were looking to price in a little of that right now with yields on two-year treasuries down a whopping 21 basis points for the week at 4.85%. That was their best weekly performance since March.翻译:国债投资者目前希望消化其中的一点点，两年期国债收益率本周大幅下跌 21 个基点，至 4.85%。这是他们自三月份以来最好的每周表现。

Ten-year note yields stood at 4.45%, having fallen 18 basis points for the week so far, a rousing rally from the 5.02% high hit just a month ago.翻译:十年期国债收益率为 4.45%，本周迄今已下跌 18 个基点，较一个月前触及的 5.02% 高点出现令人振奋的反弹。

The sea change in market pricing for the Fed has left the dollar looking soggy, with the euro up at $1.0855 and holding gains of 1.6% for the week so far.翻译:美联储市场定价的巨大变化使得美元看起来疲软，欧元兑美元汇率上涨至1.0855美元，本周迄今为止涨幅为1.6%。

The dollar even lost ground to the yen, easing to 150.63 yen and away from a 151.92 peak hit early in the week. It fared better against commodity-linked currencies such as the Canadian dollar , which were hampered by the slide in oil.翻译:美元兑日元汇率甚至下跌，跌至 150.63 日元，远离本周初触及的 151.92 日元峰值。它兑加元等大宗商品相关货币的表现较好，而加元则受到石油下滑的阻碍。

The drop in bond yields proved bullish for gold, which nudged up to $1,985 an ounce .翻译:债券收益率的下降对黄金有利，金价升至每盎司 1,985 美元。

Reporting by Wayne Cole; Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:韦恩·科尔报道；山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 富有创意的李让韩国教练克林斯曼感到高兴
item.description:
South Korea coach Juergen Klinsmann was highly impressed with the creativity of Paris St Germain playmaker Lee Kang-in as his side opened their World Cup qualifying campaign with a 5-0 win over Singapore on Thursday.翻译:韩国队主教练于尔根·克林斯曼对巴黎圣日耳曼队中场核心李康仁的创造力印象深刻，他的球队周四以 5-0 战胜新加坡队开启了世界杯预选赛的征程。

Faced with a team featuring English Premier League standouts Son Heung-in and Hwang Hee-chan as well as Lee, Singapore kept 10 men behind the ball for much of the Asian qualifying Group C contest in Seoul.翻译:在首尔举行的亚洲区预选赛C组比赛中，新加坡队面对由英超球星孙兴仁、黄喜瓒以及李明博组成的球队，在大部分比赛中都保持着10人的控球能力。

"When you play teams that play against you very defensively, you need creativity," Klinsmann told reporters, according to the Yonhap News Agency.翻译:据韩联社报道，克林斯曼对记者表示：“当你与防守非常严密的球队交手时，你需要创造力。”

"You need players that can cross the balls in, you need runs into the box, you need fast passing, high tempo and getting balls if possible behind the backline if there's a little bit of space.翻译:“你需要能够传中的球员，你需要跑进禁区，你需要快速传球，高节奏，如果可能的话，如果有一点空间，你需要在后线后面拿球。

"Kang-in can play these balls. He can score himself. The growth of Kang-in over the last six months is a joy for us as coaches."翻译:“康仁可以打这些球。他可以自己得分。过去六个月康仁的成长对我们作为教练来说是一种快乐。”

Lee did get on the scoresheet late in the game to put a gloss on the scoreline after earlier goals from Cho Gue-sung, Hwang and Son, as well as a Hwang Ui-jo penalty.翻译:李在比赛后期确实取得了进球，在曹圭成、黄和孙的进球以及黄义祖的点球之后，为比分增添了光彩。

Former Germany striker and coach Klinsmann was also impressed with the way Lee tracked back to help out his team defensively.翻译:前德国前锋兼教练克林斯曼也对李回追帮助球队防守的方式印象深刻。

"We coaches try to teach him that it always goes both ways, Luis Enrique at Paris Saint Germain does the same thing," the World Cup winner added.翻译:“我们的教练试图告诉他，事情总是双向的，巴黎圣日耳曼的路易斯·恩里克也做了同样的事情，”这位世界杯冠军补充道。

"It's fantastic for Korean football and the national team to have a player like him to go to a completely new level."翻译:“对于韩国足球和国家队来说，拥有像他这样的球员能够达到一个全新的水平，这真是太棒了。”

Son found his own way to get past the massed Singaporean defence with a delightful curling, left-footed shot from outside the box.翻译:孙兴慜找到了自己的方式，在禁区外用一脚漂亮的左脚弧线射门突破了新加坡队的防守。

The South Korean captain needed treatment after a nasty knock to his right knee late in the second half but played out the game and was quick to reassure worried Tottenham Hotspur fans.翻译:这位韩国队长在下半场后半段右膝严重受伤后需要接受治疗，但他坚持踢完了比赛，并很快安抚了忧心忡忡的托特纳姆热刺球迷。

"I'm fine," he said. "I am not the only one hurting out there. Everyone plays with some bumps and bruises."翻译:“我很好，”他说。 “我不是唯一一个受伤的人。每个人在比赛中都会遇到一些颠簸和瘀伤。”

South Korea, looking to qualify for an 11th straight edition of the World Cup finals, take on China in Shenzhen in their second qualifier on Tuesday.翻译:韩国希望连续 11 次晋级世界杯决赛圈，周二将在深圳举行第二场预选赛，迎战中国队。

Reporting by Nick Mulvenney, editing by ...翻译:尼克·马尔文尼报道，编辑...

item.title: 中国希望斐济继续“坚定”支持北京 - 官方媒体
item.description:
China said it hopes Fiji will continue to give 'firm' support to it on issues concerning Beijing's core interests and major concerns, state media cited President Xi Jinping as saying to Fijian Prime Minister Sitiveni Rabuka.翻译:官方媒体援引国家主席习近平对斐济总理拉布卡的话说，中国表示希望斐济继续在涉及北京核心利益和重大关切的问题上给予中国“坚定”支持。

Rabuka, who became the first new prime minister in Fiji in 16 years in December, met Xi for the first time on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit in San Francisco on Thursday.翻译:去年12月成为斐济16年来首位新总理的拉布卡周四在旧金山亚太经合组织(APEC)峰会期间首次会见习近平。

Fiji's government said in a statement the meeting was focused on China's Belt and Road Initiative, and the leaders discussed Beijing's concessional loan to Fiji and a joint project to modernise Fiji's ports.翻译:斐济政府在一份声明中表示，会议重点讨论了中国的“一带一路”倡议，领导人讨论了北京向斐济提供的优惠贷款以及斐济港口现代化联合项目。

In the statement, Fiji expressed support for Xi's "vision for global security" which it said mirrored Rabuka's advocacy for a "Pacific Zone of Peace".翻译:斐济在声明中表示支持习近平的“全球安全愿景”，称这反映了拉布卡对“太平洋和平区”的主张。

"In the face of global uncertainties and geopolitical pressures, Prime Minister Rabuka expressed Fiji's solidarity with China's Global Security Initiative (GSI), aimed at constructing a diplomatic and security architecture through multilateral treaties, alliances, and institutions," the Fiji statement said.翻译:斐济声明称：“面对全球不确定性和地缘政治压力，拉布卡总理表示斐济支持中国的全球安全倡议，旨在通过多边条约、联盟和机构构建外交和安全架构。”

Xi told Rabuka that China will continue to support Fiji in safeguarding its national sovereignty, security and territorial integrity, Chinese state television said.翻译:据中国国家电视台报道，习近平向拉布卡表示，中方将继续支持斐济维护国家主权、安全和领土完整。

Xi told the Fijian leader that China is willing to work with the Pacific island nation to strengthen political mutual trust and expand practical cooperation.翻译:习近平向斐济领导人表示，中方愿同斐济一道，加强政治互信，拓展务实合作。

China supports Fiji in independently choosing its own development path and achieving national development and revitalisation, Xi said.翻译:中方支持斐济自主选择发展道路、实现国家发展振兴。

The Chinese leader said China is willing to promote cooperation in infrastructure, agriculture, forestry and fisheries, new energy and other areas to help Fiji's economic and social development.翻译:中方愿同斐方推进基础设施、农林渔业、新能源等领域合作，助力斐济经济社会发展。

China is also willing to increase Fijian imports, support commercial investments into Fiji and encourage more tourists to visit Fiji.翻译:中方也愿增加斐济进口，支持对斐济商业投资，鼓励更多游客赴斐济旅游。

China's policy on the Pacific Island nations fully respects the sovereignty and independence of those countries without attaching political conditions or empty promises, Xi added, saying that China develops ties with the countries without "selfish motives".翻译:习近平补充说，中国对太平洋岛国的政策充分尊重太平洋岛国的主权和独立，不附加政治条件和空头承诺，中国发展同太平洋岛国关系没有任何“私心”。

Shortly after forming government, Rabuka put on hold a decade-old police cooperation deal between Fiji and China, and last month said his government would strengthen defence ties with major aid donor Australia.翻译:组建政府后不久，拉布卡搁置了斐济与中国之间长达十年的警察合作协议，并于上个月表示，他的政府将加强与主要援助国澳大利亚的防务关系。

China has been pushing for greater security and trade ties with Pacific Islands countries, signing a security pact with Solomon Islands, raising alarm in the United States which responded by striking a defence deal with Papua New Guinea.翻译:中国一直在推动与太平洋岛国加强安全和贸易关系，与所罗门群岛签署了安全协定，这引起了美国的警惕，美国以与巴布亚新几内亚达成防务协议作为回应。

Rabuka has said that the Pacific Islands should be a "zone of peace" and that he hoped the rivalry between China and the U.S. in the region will not turn into conflict.翻译:拉布卡表示，太平洋岛屿应该是“和平区” ，希望中美在该地区的竞争不要演变成冲突。

The Fiji statement said Xi had expressed interest in funding major capital projects.翻译:斐济声明称，习近平已表示有兴趣为重大资本项目提供资金。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Beijing newsroom, and Kirsty Needham in Sydney; Editing by Christopher Cushing, Stephen Coates and Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:Liz Lee 和北京新闻编辑室以及悉尼的 Kirsty Needham 的报道；编辑：Christopher Cushing、Stephen Coates 和 Raju Gopalakrishnan

item.title: 随着美国通胀降温，美元将每周下跌
item.description:
Summary:
  • Dollar strength on 'borrowed time' as US rates peak
  • Even yen eyes weekly rise vs USD
  • Oil slide weighs on commodity currencies
翻译:概括：
  • 美国利率见顶，美元借“借来的时间”走强
  • 甚至日元兑美元也有望每周上涨
  • 石油滑坡打压商品货币

The dollar was headed for its largest weekly drop for months against the euro, yen and franc on Friday, as investors sold in anticipation of almost 100 basis points of U.S. interest rate cuts next year.翻译:周五，美元兑欧元、日元和瑞郎将创下数月来最大单周跌幅，因投资者预期美国明年降息近100个基点而抛售美元。

At $1.0854 to the euro , the dollar has shed 1.6% for the week, its steepest fall since mid-July. It is also down 1.6% for the week to 0.8882 Swiss francs and has even lost 0.6% to trade at 150.53 on the out-of-favour yen .翻译:美元兑欧元汇率为1.0854美元，本周下跌1.6%，为7月中旬以来的最大跌幅。本周也下跌 1.6% 至 0.8882 瑞士法郎，甚至因日元贬值而下跌 0.6% 至 150.53 瑞士法郎。

Oil hit four-month lows on Thursday and Walmart said it will cut prices, adding to the disinflationary pressures that data this week showed had steadied U.S. consumer prices and convinced investors inflation is in retreat and rate increases are over.翻译:油价周四触及四个月低点， 沃尔玛表示将降价，这加剧了通货紧缩压力，本周的数据显示，美国消费者价格趋于稳定，并使投资者确信通胀正在回落，加息已经结束。

Thursday's batch of weak U.S. economic data also reinforced that stance. Futures markets have priced in 98 basis points of Fed rate cuts next year, compared with 73 bps a week ago.翻译:周四公布的一系列疲软的美国经济数据也强化了这一立场。期货市场已消化美联储明年降息 98 个基点，而一周前为 73 个基点。

"While the amount of easing factored in appears aggressive, the direction of travel looks right," said Peter Dragicevich, strategist at cross-border payments firm Corpay in a note.翻译:跨境支付公司Corpay策略师彼得·德拉吉塞维奇(Peter Dragicevich)在一份报告中表示，“虽然考虑到的宽松力度似乎很激进，但发展方向看起来是正确的。”

"The U.S. inflation pulse has turned, and the negative consequences of past policy tightening is starting to manifest," he said.翻译:“美国通胀脉搏已经转向，过去政策紧缩的负面后果开始显现，”他表示。

"As the next Fed easing cycle comes into view, U.S. yields move lower, and U.S. growth comes back to the pack, we are looking for the USD to gradually deflate over the next few quarters."翻译:“随着美联储下一个宽松周期的到来，美国国债收益率走低，美国经济增长恢复正常，我们预计美元在未来几个季度将逐渐通货紧缩。”

Sterling is up 1.5% for the week at $1.2410. The Australian and New Zealand dollars lost a bit of shine on Thursday, when signs of a slowing U.S. economy knocked commodity prices but they remain set for weekly gains.翻译:英镑本周上涨 1.5%，至 1.2410 美元。由于美国经济放缓的迹象打击了大宗商品价格，澳元和新西兰元周四失去了一些光芒，但仍将每周上涨。

Moves in Asia trade on Friday were small, leaving the Aussie at $0.6466, up 1.7% on the week, and the kiwi at $0.5960, up 1.2% on the week.翻译:周五亚洲交易波动较小，澳元兑美元报 0.6466 美元，本周上涨 1.7%，新西兰元报 0.5960 美元，本周上涨 1.2%。

China's yuan was eyeing its best week in two months and traded near a three-month high at 7.2447 per dollar.翻译:中国人民币汇率有望创下两个月来最好的一周表现，并接近三个月高点，兑美元汇率为7.2447。

"As soon as markets become confident a Fed rates peak is in ... prevailing dollar strength will be seen to be on borrowed time," strategists at National Australia Bank said in a note.翻译:澳大利亚国民银行策略师在一份报告中表示，“一旦市场对美联储利率见顶充满信心……美元的普遍走强将被视为是借来的时间。”

Several European Central Bank speakers appear later on Friday, British retail sales data is due along with U.S. housing starts. In cryptocurrencies, bitcoin is set to snap a four-week winning streak with a modest 1.8% fall to $36,416.翻译:周五晚些时候，几位欧洲央行发言人将出席，英国零售销售数据将与美国新屋开工数据一起公布。在加密货币领域，比特币将小幅下跌 1.8%，至 36,416 美元，结束连续四周的上涨势头。

Reporting by Rae Wee; Editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Rae Wee 报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: Rae Wee, Tom Westbrook

item.title: 中国的习近平从拜登会议中得到了什么
item.description:
When Chinese President Xi Jinping met executives for dinner on Wednesday night in San Francisco, he was greeted with not one, but three standing ovations from the U.S. business community.翻译:周三晚上，当中国国家主席习近平在旧金山与高管们共进晚餐时，美国商界不止一个，而是三个起立鼓掌。

It was one of several public relations wins for the Chinese leader on his first trip in six years to the United States, where he and President Joe Biden reached agreements covering fentanyl, military communications and artificial intelligence on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit.翻译:这是这位中国领导人六年来首次访问美国时取得的几项公关胜利之一，他和总统乔·拜登在亚太经合组织会议期间达成了涉及芬太尼、军事通信和人工智能的协议首脑。

All three were outcomes the United States had sought from China rather than the other way around, said two people briefed on the trip.翻译:两位了解此行情况的人士表示，这三项成果都是美国向中国寻求的结果，而不是相反。

But Xi appeared to have achieved his own aims: earning U.S. policy concessions in exchange for promises of cooperation, an easing of bilateral tensions that will allow more focus on economic growth, and a chance to appeal to foreign investors who increasingly shun China.翻译:但习近平似乎已经实现了自己的目标：赢得美国的政策让步，以换取合作承诺、缓和双边紧张局势，从而更加关注经济增长，以及吸引越来越回避中国的外国投资者的机会。

China's economy is slowing and earlier this month it reported its first quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment. And the ruling Communist Party has battled political intrigues that have raised questions about Xi's decision-making, including the sudden and unexplained removals of his foreign minister and defense minister.翻译:中国经济正在放缓，本月早些时候，中国公布了首个季度外国直接投资赤字。执政的共产党一直在与政治阴谋作斗争，这些阴谋对习近平的决策提出了质疑，包括突然且不明原因地罢免了外交部长和国防部长。

"If the U.S. and China can manage their differences ... it will mean that Xi Jinping doesn't have to divert all of his attention to that (bilateral relations)," said Alexander Neill, an adjunct fellow at Hawaii's Pacific Forum think-tank.翻译:夏威夷太平洋论坛的兼职研究员亚历山大·尼尔表示：“如果美国和中国能够处理好分歧……这将意味着习近平不必将所有注意力都转移到（双边关系）上。”坦克。

"He needs to focus on his domestic agenda which is incredibly pressing."

DROPPING SANCTIONS FOR COOPERATION

Securing Xi's promise of Chinese cooperation on stemming the flow of fentanyl to the United States was high on Biden's to-do list for the summit. A senior U.S. official said the agreement under which China would go after specific companies that produce fentanyl precursors was made on a "trust but verify" basis.翻译:确保习近平在阻止芬太尼流入美国方面与中国合作的承诺是拜登此次峰会的首要任务。一位美国高级官员表示，中国将在“信任但核实”的基础上达成一项协议，根据该协议，中国将追查生产芬太尼前体的特定公司。

In return, the U.S. government on Thursday removed a Chinese public security forensic institute from a Commerce Department trade sanction list, where it was placed in 2020 over alleged abuses against Uyghurs, a long-sought diplomatic aim for China.翻译:作为回报，美国政府周四将一家中国公安法医机构从商务部贸易制裁名单中删除，该机构于 2020 年因涉嫌虐待维吾尔人而被列入制裁名单，而这也是中国长期以来寻求的外交目标。

Critics warned removing sanctions against the institute signals to Beijing that U.S. entity listings are negotiable, and have questioned the Biden administration's commitment to pressuring China over what it says is the Chinese government's genocide of Uyghurs.翻译:批评人士警告说，取消对该研究所的制裁向北京发出了这样的信号：美国实体清单是可以谈判的，并质疑拜登政府是否承诺就中国政府对维吾尔人的种族灭绝向中国施压。

"This undermines the credibility of our entity list and our moral authority," said a spokesperson for the Republican-led House of Representative's select committee on China.翻译:共和党领导的众议院中国特别委员会的一位发言人表示：“这损害了我们实体清单的可信度和我们的道德权威。”

On top of that, Biden's Republican opponents argue the U.S. is missing an opportunity by not leveraging China's flagging economic momentum for more diplomatic gains.翻译:最重要的是，拜登的共和党对手认为，美国没有利用中国疲软的经济势头来获取更多外交收益，从而错失了一个机会。

Biden also touted as a success an agreement to resume military dialogues cut by China following then-U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's 2022 trip to Chinese-claimed Taiwan.翻译:拜登还宣称，继时任美国众议院议长南希·佩洛西 2022 年访问中国声称拥有主权的台湾之后，中国中断的恢复军事对话的协议取得了成功。

But while Beijing would welcome lower tensions, this is unlikely to change Chinese military behavior the U.S. sees as dangerous, such as intercepts of U.S. ships and aircraft in international waters that have led to a number of near-misses.翻译:尽管北京欢迎紧张局势缓和，但这不太可能改变美国认为危险的中国军事行为，例如在国际水域拦截美国船只和飞机，导致多次险些失手。

"China fears hotlines could be used as a potential pretext for a U.S. presence in areas it claims as its own," said Craig Singleton, a China expert at the Foundation for Defense of Democracies in Washington.翻译:华盛顿保卫民主基金会的中国问题专家克雷格·辛格尔顿表示：“中国担心热线电话可能会被用作美国在其声称拥有主权的地区存在的潜在借口。”

Biden administration officials have acknowledged that creating functional military relations won't be as easy as semi-regular meetings between defense officials.翻译:拜登政府官员承认，建立功能性军事关系并不像国防官员之间的半定期会议那么容易。

"This is a long, hard, slow slog and the Chinese have to see value in that mil-mil before they'll do it. That's not going to be a favor to us," one senior Biden administration told Reuters in October in the run-up to the Xi-Biden meeting.

PARTNER AND FRIEND?

In his public remarks to Biden, Xi suggested China sought peaceful coexistence with the United States, and he told business leaders China was ready to be a "partner and friend" to the U.S., words partially aimed at a business community alarmed by China's crackdown on various industries and the use of exit bans and detentions against some executives.翻译:在对拜登的公开讲话中，习近平建议中国寻求与美国和平共处，他还告诉商界领袖，中国已准备好成为美国的“伙伴和朋友”，这句话在一定程度上是针对因中国镇压而感到震惊的商界人士。以及对一些高管实施出境禁令和拘留。

Similarly, Xi's televised garden walk with Biden, and the largely respectful reception given to Xi by his American hosts, was highlighted in China's tightly controlled media to show a domestic audience that their president is managing the country's most important economic and political relationship.翻译:同样，习近平在电视转播中与拜登一起在花园散步，以及美国东道主对习近平的基本上尊重的接待，在中国严格控制的媒体上得到了强调，向国内观众表明，他们的总统正在管理该国最重要的经济和政治关系。

"Xi Jinping may have made the calculation that overhyping the American threat does China and his standing in the party and the party itself more harm than good," said Drew Thompson, a former Pentagon official who is now a scholar at the National University of Singapore.翻译:前五角大楼官员、现任新加坡国立大学学者德鲁·汤普森 (Drew Thompson) 表示：“习近平可能盘算过分夸大美国的威胁，这对中国、他在党内的地位以及党本身弊大于利。” 。

"The fact that we are debating whether China is investible is a real problem for China."翻译:“我们正在争论中国是否可以投资，这对中国来说是一个真正的问题。”

At the same time, Xi reiterated to Biden points that he made earlier this year to Russian President Vladimir Putin, urging the U.S. president to view U.S.-China relations through "accelerating global transformations unseen in a century."翻译:与此同时，习近平向拜登重申了他今年早些时候向俄罗斯总统普京提出的观点，敦促美国总统通过“百年未有之加速的全球变革”来看待美中关系。

Analysts say that is code for the belief that China - and Russia - are remolding the U.S.-led international system.翻译:分析人士表示，这表明人们相信中国和俄罗斯正在重塑美国领导的国际体系。

Still, this time pragmatism may have outweighed ideology.翻译:尽管如此，这一次实用主义可能超过了意识形态。

China recognizes it's still necessary for its economic progress to have somewhat normal relations with the U.S. and Western countries, said Li Mingjiang, a professor at the Rajaratnam School of International Studies in Singapore.翻译:新加坡拉惹勒南国际研究学院教授李明江表示，中国认识到，为了实现自身经济发展，仍然有必要与美国和西方国家建立一定程度的正常关系。

"It's the fundamental driving force behind the meeting."翻译:“这是这次会议背后的根本推动力。”

item.title: 人民币贬值使中国成为第二大贸易融资货币
item.description:
Global companies are making a beeline for China's debt markets, issuing record amounts of yuan-denominated bonds and borrowing heavily from mainland banks, capitalising on rock-bottom yuan interest rates as funding costs elsewhere jump.翻译:全球企业正直奔中国债务市场，发行创纪录数量的人民币计价债券，并向内地银行大量借贷，在其他地方融资成本飙升之际，利用人民币利率处于最低水平的机会。

Companies and banks are raising record amounts of cash through yuan bonds issued in mainland China and in Hong Kong, known as panda and dim sum bonds, respectively.翻译:公司和银行通过在中国大陆和香港发行的人民币债券（分别称为熊猫债和点心债）筹集了创纪录数量的现金。

The surge in their borrowing from Chinese banks has catapulted the yuan past the euro into becoming the second-biggest currency used in global trade finance, providing a fillip to Beijing's ambitions to internationalize the yuan.翻译:他们从中国银行借款的激增使人民币超越欧元成为全球贸易融资中使用的第二大货币，这为北京实现人民币国际化的雄心提供了动力。

The global rush to borrow from China is counterintuitive, coming as international investors are shunning the world's second-biggest economy out of concerns about geopolitical tensions and weak growth, says Fiona Lim, senior FX strategist at Maybank.翻译:马来亚银行高级外汇策略师 Fiona Lim 表示，全球纷纷向中国借钱的现象是违反直觉的，因为国际投资者出于对地缘政治紧张局势和增长疲弱的担忧而避开世界第二大经济体。

"While the fundamental story is not compelling for Chinese investors looking for growth, the depreciation of the yuan as well as the rate cuts result in a much cheaper cost of borrowing," Lim said.翻译:林说：“虽然基本面对于寻求增长的中国投资者来说并不引人注目，但人民币贬值和降息导致借贷成本大幅降低。”

Foreign companies such as German carmaker BMW (BMWG.DE) and Crédit Agricole S.A (CAGR.PA) as well as overseas units of Chinese firms raised a record 125.5 billion yuan ($17.33 billion) selling panda bonds during the January-October period, a 61% jump from the same period last year.翻译:德国汽车制造商宝马(BMWG.DE)和法国农业信贷银行(CAGR.PA)等外国公司以及中国企业的海外子公司在 1 月至 10 月期间发行熊猫债券筹集了创纪录的 1,255 亿元人民币（合 173.3 亿美元），较去年同期跃升 61%。

The National Bank of Canada (NA.TO) raised 1 billion yuan from the sale of a three-year panda bond at a coupon of 3.2% late last month, a bargain compared to rates of 4.5% at home.翻译:加拿大国家银行(NA.TO)上月底以 3.2% 的票面利率发行了三年期熊猫债，筹集了 10 亿元人民币，与国内 4.5% 的利率相比，这很便宜。

The issuance of dim sum bonds in Hong Kong also hit a record high, surging 62% from a year ago to 343 billion yuan during the first eight months. Issuance of yuan-denominated loans in the city also soared.翻译:香港点心债发行量也创下历史新高，前8个月同比增长62%至3430亿元人民币。该市的人民币贷款发放量也猛增。

For China, the growing share of yuan in global financing ticks one of its main internationalisation priorities, though the recent burst of activity appears to have been overwhelmingly for domestic use.翻译:对于中国来说，人民币在全球融资中所占的份额不断增加是其国际化的主要优先事项之一，尽管最近的爆发性活动似乎绝大多数是用于国内使用。

"Panda bonds are steadily promoting the renminbi's function as a funding currency", the People's Bank of China (PBOC) said a report last month. It has been motivating banks to lend to offshore firms and allowed broader use of yuan outside China.翻译:中国人民银行上个月的一份报告称，“熊猫债正在稳步推进人民币融资货币功能”。它一直在激励银行向离岸公司放贷，并允许人民币在中国境外更广泛地使用。

The yuan's share as a global currency in trade finance jumped to 5.8% in September from 3.91% at the start of the year, trumping the euro for the first time, according to SWIFT. The international payments system dominates the traffic of letters of credit - a form of short-term financing that facilitates trade.翻译:根据 SWIFT 的数据，人民币作为全球货币在贸易融资中的份额从年初的 3.91% 跃升至 9 月份的 5.8%，首次超过欧元。国际支付系统主导着信用证的交易——信用证是一种促进贸易的短期融资形式。

Regardless, it barely scrapes the dollar's dominance at 84.2%.翻译:无论如何，它勉强撼动了美元 84.2% 的主导地位。

Several gauges of yuan internationalisation -- including a Standard Chartered Bank tracker measuring the global use of the yuan, and Bank of China's Cross-border RMB Index (CRI) -- all hit record highs this year.

TOO EARLY TO CELEBRATE

However, analysts point to the limited use and circulation of international yuan bond proceeds so far, and say it’s premature to trumpet internationalisation.翻译:然而，分析人士指出，迄今为止国际人民币债券收益的使用和流通有限，并表示现在鼓吹国际化还为时过早。

German automaker Volkswagen Group (VOWG_p.DE) told Reuters it will use its inaugural 1.5 billion yuan panda bond proceeds only for its onshore China business.翻译:德国汽车制造商大众汽车集团(VOWG_p.DE)告诉路透社，其首期 15 亿元人民币熊猫债券募集资金将仅用于其在中国境内的业务。

The Mercedes-Benz Group (MBGn.DE) also plans to use its panda bond proceeds to support a car leasing business in China.翻译:梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（MBGn.DE）还计划利用其熊猫债券收益来支持中国的汽车租赁业务。

Yuan internationalisation "isn't going as well as the headline figures might suggest," said Mark Williams, chief Asia economist at Capital Economics.翻译:凯投宏观(Capital Economics)首席亚洲经济学家马克·威廉姆斯(Mark Williams)表示，人民币国际化“并不像总体数据所显示的那样顺利”。

"It's still the case that more than half of cross-border transactions using the yuan are between the mainland and Hong Kong. This is a very local form of internationalisation."翻译:“使用人民币的跨境交易仍然有一半以上发生在内地和香港之间。这是一种非常本地化的国际化形式。”

Maybank's Lim concurs. "We should be discerning of the cross-border transactions that are between China and Hong Kong versus China and the rest of the world."翻译:马来亚银行的林同意这一观点。 “我们应该辨别中国与香港之间以及中国与世界其他地区之间的跨境交易。”

Within trade finance and payments, the yuan's use is largely limited to developing countries friendly to China, such as those joining its Belt and Road initiative.翻译:在贸易融资和支付领域，人民币的使用主要限于对中国友好的发展中国家，例如那些加入“一带一路”倡议的国家。

"There has been a surge in use of the yuan to settle trade, but only within specific bilateral channels: countries like Russia, Argentina, Pakistan and Nigeria," Williams said.翻译:威廉姆斯表示：“使用人民币进行贸易结算的情况激增，但仅限于特定的双边渠道：俄罗斯、阿根廷、巴基斯坦和尼日利亚等国家。”

Countries that are geopolitically aligned with the U.S. "are showing no willingness to switch over to using the yuan. That suggests that global use of the yuan in trade will hit a low ceiling."翻译:与美国在地缘政治上结盟的国家“没有表现出转而使用人民币的意愿。这表明全球在贸易中使用人民币将触及一个较低的上限。”

($1 = 7.2421 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2421 人民币）

item.title: 研究人员称越南加大南海岛屿扩张力度
item.description:
Vietnam has been ramping up its dredging and landfill work in the Spratly Islands in the South China Sea, creating another 330 acres of land since December last year, a U.S. think tank said in a report.翻译:美国一家智库在一份报告中称，自去年12月以来，越南一直在南沙群岛加大疏浚和垃圾填埋工作，新增了330英亩土地。

The expansion, much larger than 120 acres it had created between 2012 and 2022, made Vietnam second only to China in terms of island buildup in the Spratly Islands, Washington's Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) said in the report this week, citing satellite imagery.翻译:华盛顿战略与国际研究中心 (CSIS) 在本周的报告中援引称，这次扩张远远超过了 2012 年至 2022 年期间创建的 120 英亩，使越南在南沙群岛的岛屿建设方面仅次于中国。卫星图像。

Vietnam's Ministry of Foreign Affairs did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:越南外交部没有立即回应置评请求。

China claims sovereignty over vast swathes of the South China Sea, including the areas where Vietnam has been building up islands.翻译:中国声称对南海大片地区拥有主权，其中包括越南一直在建设岛屿的地区。

The sea is one of the world's most contested waterways, where more than $3 trillion of trade passes each year. China, Brunei, Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam have lodged competing claims for some or all of the Spratly Islands.翻译:海洋是世界上竞争最激烈的水道之一，每年经过的贸易额超过 3 万亿美元。中国、文莱、马来西亚、菲律宾、台湾和越南都对部分或全部南沙群岛提出了相互竞争的主权声索。

The recent expansion by Vietnam was the most noticeable at Barque Canada Reef, called Bai Thuyen Chai in Vietnam, where the report, produced by CSIS's Asia Maritime Transparency Initiative (AMTI), said 210 acres of land was created in the past year.翻译:越南最近的扩张最为引人注目的是巴克加拿大礁（在越南被称为 Bai Thuyen Chai），CSIS 亚洲海事透明度倡议 (AMTI) 发布的报告称，过去一年这里新增了 210 英亩土地。

The report said Vietnam had started using cutter suction dredgers to "accelerate its dredging efforts", and last month, it began dredging at two additional features, including South Reef and Central Reef.翻译:报告称，越南已开始使用绞吸式挖泥船“加速疏浚工作”，上个月，越南开始在另外两个地物上进行疏浚，包括南礁和中央礁。

It said Vietnam's efforts have remained focused on dredging and landfill, with construction of infrastructure yet to begin.翻译:报告称，越南的努力仍集中在疏浚和垃圾填埋方面，基础设施建设尚未开始。

China created more than 3,200 acres of land from 2013 to 2016 in the area, the think tank said.翻译:该智库称，2013年至2016年，中国在该地区开辟了3200多英亩土地。

In August, the Philippines, Malaysia, Taiwan and Vietnam rejected a map released by China that denotes its claims to sovereignty including in the South China Sea.翻译:8月，菲律宾、马来西亚、台湾和越南拒绝了中国发布的地图，该地图显示了中国对包括南中国海在内的主权主张。

Reporting by Khanh Vu; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Khanh Vu 的报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 中缅边境地区发生5.7级地震 - GFZ
